name: Bar Centro
description: Experience all the action at this chic raised bar and lounge in the center of the Eldorado casino. Fuchsia and amethyst colors with silver and pearl accents comfortably seat 40 with plenty of space for late night happenings. The island bar dazzles with a stunning rectangular chandelier made from 36-ribbed glass cylinders suspended at various heights. Cocktails are made with juice freshly hand-squeezed by skilled bartenders.
shortDescription: Chic raised casino bar with stunning chandelier, fresh-squeezed cocktails, and late-night energy.
hours: Mon - Wed Closed | Thu 6pm - 2am | Fri - Sun 10am - Close

faqs.question: What makes Bar Centro special?
faqs.answer: A stunning rectangular chandelier, fresh hand-squeezed cocktails, and a chic raised position in the center of the casino.

faqs.question: When is Bar Centro open?
faqs.answer: Thursday 6pm-2am, Friday through Sunday 10am to close. Closed Monday through Wednesday.

faqs.question: How many seats?
faqs.answer: Comfortably seats 40 with additional space for late night happenings.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at Bar Centro are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Sandy L.

testimonials.quote: Bar Centro has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside eldorado-resorts-reno-eldorado-at-the-row. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Keith F.
